title: Video: Sleep ∞ Over – Casual Diamond
content:
Austin based songstress Stefanie Franciotti aka Sleep ∞ Over has just dropped a psychedelic new video for synth dominated track Casual Diamond, ahead of her debut full length release Forever which will be available towards the end of the month.

It’s a fairly haunting and threatening video, featuring numerous scenes with sharp knives, sinister hooded figures and distressed dancing. There’s a narrative of sorts, yet I can’t quite figure out the exact roles of the various characters, that become distorted amongst the blurred images and eerie shadows. Check out the video below, featuring the heavily Cocteau Twins inspired Casual Diamond.

Sleep ∞ Over – Casual Diamond (OFFICIAL VIDEO) from Christine Aprile on Vimeo.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
